summary.para: Records a decode frame operation to the command list. Inputs, outputs, and parameters for the decode are specified as arguments to this method. Takes a structure to support video decode histograms.

param.name: pDecoder
param.para: A pointer to an interface representing a decoder instance.

param.name: pOutputArguments
param.para: A structure specifying the output surface and output arguments.

param.name: pInputArguments
param.para: A structure specifying the input bitstream, reference frames, and other input parameters.

summary.para: Encapsulates a list of graphics commands for video decoding. This interface inherits from and adds support for video decode histograms.
